plot: The three members of Luminous started their tour in Hokkaido, where they met two girls who love singing and dancing: Nono Ōji and Lisa Shirakaba.
opening_theme: "START DASH SENSATION" by Ruka, Mona, & Miki from AIKATSU ☆ STARS!
ending_theme: "lucky train!" by Ruka, Mona, & Miki from AIKATSU☆STARS！
insert_song: "Aurora Princess" (オーロラプリンセス) by Eri from STAR☆ANIS (ep 172)
"Egao no Suncatcher" (笑顔のSuncatcher) by Risuko & Mona from STAR☆ANIS (ep 173)
"Friend" (フレンド) by Nanase & Kana from AIKATSU☆STARS! (ep 171)
"Happy Crescendo" (ハッピィクレッシェンド) by Fūri, Yuna, Sunao, & Eri from STAR☆ANIS (ep 172)
"Hello Hello" (ハローハロー) by Miki from AIKATSU☆STARS! (ep 169)
"Hello! Winter Love" (はろー! Winter Love♪) by Miki, Ruka, & Mona from AIKATSU ☆ STARS (ep 165)
"Ibara no Joō" (いばらの女王) by Mona from AIKATSU☆STARS! (ep 166)
"Let's Aikatsu!" (Let's アイカツ!) by Ruka, Mona, & Miki from AIKATSU☆STARS! (ep 153)
"Lonely Gravity" (ロンリー・グラヴィティ) by Ruka & Nanase from AIKATSU☆STARS! (ep 159)

"Magical Time" (マジカルタイム) by Fūri from STAR☆ANIS (ep 172)
"Miel Miere" (ミエルミエール) by Kana from AIKATSU☆STARS! (eps 161,162)
"MY SHOW TIME!" by Nanase from AIKATSU☆STARS! (ep 175)
"Otona Mode" (オトナモード) by Risuko & Mona from STAR☆ANIS (ep 173)

"Yakusoku Carat" (約束カラット; Promise Carat) by Miho & Nanase from AIKATSU☆STARS! (ep 155)
